org.audacity.name: Audacity
org.audacity.biography: Audacity is the world's most popular free software for recording and editing audio. So if you’re producing music, a podcast, or just playing around with audio, Audacity is for you. It is available to download as a desktop app for Windows, macOS and Linux.

org.blenderfoundation.name: Blender Foundation
org.blenderfoundation.biography: The Blender Foundation (2002) is an independent public benefit organization with the purpose to provide a complete, free and open source 3D creation pipeline, managed by public projects on blender.org.

org.brave.name: Brave
org.brave.biography: The browser that puts you first

org.discord.name: Discord Inc.
org.discord.biography: Discord is a voice, video, and text communication platform used by over two hundred million people to hang out and play games with their friends.

org.git.name: Git
org.git.biography:
Git is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency.
Git is easy to learn and has a tiny footprint with lightning fast performance. It outclasses SCM tools like Subversion, CVS, Perforce, and ClearCase with features like cheap local branching, convenient staging areas, and multiple workflows.

org.gnome.name: GNOME
org.gnome.biography: GNOME is a thriving community of contributors and supporting organizations. Our project is made up of participants from across the globe, and includes volunteers and paid contributors. Our work encompasses every aspect of the software development process, from design, through to development, testing, and documentation.

org.gpro.name: Grand Prix Racing Online
org.gpro.biography: GPRO is #1 FREE massively multiplayer online F1 Grand Prix management simulator.

org.kde.name: KDE e.V.
org.kde.biography: KDE is an open community of friendly people who want to create a world in which everyone has control over their digital life and enjoys freedom and privacy.

org.meta.name: Meta
org.meta.biography: We're building the future of human connection. And the technologies that make it possible.

org.microsoft.name: Microsoft Corporation
org.microsoft.biography: We empower the world. Microsoft's mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more.

org.thedocumentfoundation.name: The Document Foundation
org.thedocumentfoundation.biography:
The Document Foundation is an independent self-governing meritocratic entity, created by a large group of Free Software advocates, in the form of a charitable Foundation under German law (gemeinnützige rechtsfähige Stiftung des bürgerlichen Rechts).
It continues to build on the foundation of the dedicated work by the OpenOffice.org Community.
It was created in the belief that the culture born of an independent Foundation brings out the best in contributors and will deliver the best software for users.
It is open to any individual who agrees with our core values and contributes to our activities.
It welcomes corporate participation, e.g. by sponsoring individuals to work as equals alongside other contributors in the community.
 The Document Foundation is proud to be the home of LibreOffice, the next evolution of the world’s leading free office suite, and The Document Liberation Project, a community of developers united to free users from vendor lock-in of content by providing powerful tools for the conversion of proprietary file formats to the corresponding ODF format.

usr.metamuffin.name: metamuffin
usr.metamuffin.biography: Hi. I am a normal person from planet earth. I do not know what to write here. I enjoy starting projects and never finishing them. I am also supporting the free software movement by writing exclusively free software in my spare time.

usr.nokyan.name: nokyan
usr.nokyan.biography: I’m nokyan, a 24 years old software engineer and open-source enthusiast from Germany.

usr.rocksdanister.name: Dani John
usr.rocksdanister.biography: I make fun software like Lively Wallpaper and Lively Weather.

usr.schmidhuberj.name: Julian Schmidhuber
usr.schmidhuberj.biography: Hi, I am Schmiddi. I am currently studying computer science at the University of Passau.

usr.shonubot.name: Kavish Advani
usr.shonubot.biography: I'm Kavish, a GNU/Linux enthusiast passionate about open-source development, theming, and crafting better desktop experiences.

usr.vixalien.name: Angelo Verlain
usr.vixalien.biography: Hello! I'm Angelo Verlain, but you can call me vixalien. I am a web and GTK developer.
